name: Volt
description: Volt is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its forest green box body and retro console buttons, it exudes a nostalgic charm. Its rocket arms and legs allow it to maneuver with agility and speed, making it an excellent companion for any adventure. The classic screen displays detailed waveforms and data, while the glasses add a touch of sophistication to its appearance. Volt possesses a wide range of abilities and skills, making it a valuable asset to the club.
